text: Topkaya is a village in Mut district of Mersin Province, Turkey. It is situated at in the plateaus of the Toros Mountains. The Göksu River flows about to the east of the village Its distance to Mut is and to Mersin is . Population of Topkaya was 159 as of 2012.Statistical Institute ==References== Category:Villages in Mut District
title: Topkaya, Mut
